sov·ran.definition: [-vrən]a person or political entity (as a nation or state) possessing or held to possess sovereignty [a controversy between two…the United States on the one hand and the State of California on the other ""] see alsoat
sov·ran.s: …the United States on the one hand and the State of California on the other "

3.definition: relating to, characteristic of, or befitting a sovereign
